name: INTERACTIVE HORROR STORIES (LessdessdouxStudio)
description:
DISCOVER A NEW INTERACTIVE STORY

********************************************************************************

Links to the downloads can be found at the bottom of the page

Android version => https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.horrorstoriesxdlx

Version Française du jeu (French version) =>https://lessdessdouxstudio.itch.io/les-histoires-horreurs-interactives <=

********************************************************************************

SYNOPSIS

It will be important to make the right choice to move forward in the story. 

In the form of visual novel books, dive into a world covered with mysteries, abysses, cold and gloomy places similar to nightmares. But because fright has no limits, it can also take the appearance of a paradisiacal landscape. To progress through the story, you will have to make the right choice. The right to be wrong ? Maybe. Unless it is already too late to try to escape the threatening shadow lurking in the nearby abyss. The darkness that will try to take you and pull you away to the beyond. 

Feelings of torment, heartbreak, screams, anguish, panic, fear await you through the interacting stories; 

Facing your deepest fears in the hope of regaining the precious commodity of freedom ? 

Will the choices you make allow you to understand the secrets lurking in the gloomy mansion and its dark mysteries ? 

Will you be able to meet the innocent prisoner hiding in the rugged mountains ? 

Will you be able to survive through the prisons ? Unless the being of discord is closest to you... 

Make an easy trip the most beautiful or the most horrifying of all as you wish through the most magnificent dream places of nature. 

Here, there is no end. No, there are many. So starting over allows you to discover others while plunging back into fear and horror !

You have read all the stories ? But it's not the end yet thanks to the Bonus stories ! For even more reading !

While waiting for new stories, the characters are waiting for you !

********************************************************************************
